titleStmt.title: The doctrine of schism fully opened and applied to gathered churches. Occasioned by a book entituled, Sacrilegious dissertion of the holy ministery rebuked; and tolerated preaching of the Gospel vindicated. / By The author of Toleration not to be abused by the Presbyterians.
titleStmt.author: Fullwood, Francis, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.G. and B.G. for James Collins, and sold by Abisha Brocas in Exon,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Francis Fullwood by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church Library, Oxford, England.
